title: DSWD Region IV-A

title: SMPIC
description: Develop full-stack apps with Laravel, MySQL, Vue, Inertia.js, and shadcn/ui, delivering scalable backends and component-driven UIs.

title: R-NET Wired Internet Services
description: Successfully integrated the Payment Gateway into the R-NET Wired Internet Services CRM, enhancing system capabilities.

title: Relaunch Advertising
description: Integrated Stripe and PayPal payment gateways into the R-NET Wired Internet Services CRM using WordPress, Elementor, and Shopify, enhancing transaction capabilities.
